channel.title: Web on Sequr
channel.description: Recent content in Web on Sequr

item.title: FreeLancer
item.description: Write-up of the Freelancer web challenge by IhsanSencan on HackTheBox.eu. Can you test how secure my website is? Prove me wrong and capture the flag!

item.title: I know Mag1k
item.description: Write-up of the I know Mag1k web challenge by rkmylo on HackTheBox.eu. Can you get to the profile page of the admin?

item.title: Lernaean
item.description: Write-up of the Lernaean web challenge by Arraxel on HackTheBox.eu. Our target is not very good with computers.

item.title: Fuzzy
item.description: Write-up of the Fuzzy web challenge by Arraxel on HackTheBox.eu. We have gained access to some infrastructure which we believe is connected to the internal network of our target.

item.title: Cartographer
item.description: Write-up of the Cartographer web challenge by Arraxel on HackTheBox.eu. Can you break in and see what they are up to?

item.title: Emdee five for life
item.description: Write-up of the Emdee five for life web challenge by L4mpje on HackTheBox.eu. Can you encrypt fast enough?
